name: Night Valley (Spin-Off Project).
description:
Spin-off from the Valley of Night game, but told by the mysterious old man's point of view who rescues Ayla. In this story, an Adepts of the Night and LUX fought a battle in the forest, but unfortunately the Adeptos was victorious and arrested the members of the other side, still a mysterious magician managed to escape the prison and now it needs to find a protected place at the same time that it escapes of the Claws of Dark Dragons and Shadow Wolves!  

   Design project of the Customization Project at Fatenp College.

MEMBERS : 

Cristiano da Silva Kegler .

Fabiano Soares.

Victor Macedo Carvalho dos Santos.
